name: nomatic-jwt
description: JSON Web Token (JWT) utilities for Node.js

scripts.clean: rm -rf src/**/*.js src/**/*.d.ts src/**/*.js.map src/*.js src/*.d.ts src/*.js.map
scripts.test: rm -rf coverage/ && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --reporter spec
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs/ && typedoc --out ./docs/ --module commonjs --name nomatic-jwt --hideGenerator --mode file --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --gaID UA-96699243-1 ./src
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

author: Brian D. Foster <bdfoster89@gmail.com>
